title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2108.3 - Time of filing answer to protests
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2108.3 - Time of filing answer to protests

State Regulations

Where a protest against an order issued by a local rent
administrator has been filed by a landlord or tenant, the other party or
parties shall be afforded a period of 15 days from the date of service of such
protest within which to serve and file an answer to the
protest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2108.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
